title: Is my VPN connected to the right server location?

blocks.content: After signing on to Mozilla VPN and connecting to one of our 400+ servers in over 30 different countries, you can check if your VPN is active in your chosen geolocation in two easy ways:
Enter a search term like “local weather” in your browser and see a real-time weather update for your current VPN location.
Sign in to your favorite app or streaming site
Traveling abroad and need to access content from back home?

content.content: Connect to the country server of your choice
Sign on to your favorite app or streaming site
